video.title: Shushybye
video.synopsis: Combining live action, animation and happy songs, this series introduces the Shushies of Shushybye to help teach tiny tots why they need to sleep.

episodes.synopsis: Zeez comes up short when he fails to do his homework for school, and pop-music superstar Davy Jones stops by to perform some music.
episodes.title: My Dog Ate My Homework

episodes.synopsis: Michael visits Shushybye School to talk about playing music, and the Shushies stop by the library to check out books on musical instruments.
episodes.title: Your Musical Journey Begins

episodes.synopsis: Dozie shares her special cookies with her friends Snoozles and Zeez, and Miss Eve takes the Shushy class to the zoo.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Shushybye Zoo

episodes.synopsis: Miss Eve explains why it's important to take enough time to do things right, and PJ the DJ broadcasts the weather on his morning radio show.
episodes.title: The Shushy Swing

episodes.synopsis: The Shushies learn all about having special interests and hobbies, and PJ the DJ gets a request for a song.
episodes.title: We Got Your Dreams Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Snoozles lends a hand when Dozie needs inspiration making dreams, and Conductor McCloud helps Miss Eve teach the Shushies a history lesson.
episodes.title: May I Have This Dance with You

episodes.synopsis: Capt. John Yawn makes a surprise visit to Shushybye School, and the Shushies exercise their imaginations by reading and swapping books.
episodes.title: Moon-FM

episodes.synopsis: The Shushybye King makes a dream wish for a boy about to become a big brother, and Zeez amazes the Shushies with his skill at the game Sleepball.
episodes.title: Dream On

episodes.synopsis: The Shushybye King announces a special Miss Eve Day to honor the Shushybye teacher, and the Shushies get ready for the Pillow Park concert.
episodes.title: Pillow Park Rock

episodes.synopsis: As Snoozles, Zeez and Dozie get ready to throw Capt. John Yawn a surprise birthday party, PJ the DJ gets lots of birthday requests on his radio show.
episodes.title: Captain Yawn Birthday Surprise

episodes.synopsis: The Shushybye King hosts a magic competition at his castle, and the Shushies tell PJ the DJ their secrets for making dreams.
episodes.title: Feels Like Magic

episodes.synopsis: Lupita makes a dream wish about being with her grandmother, and Miss Eve teaches her students that true magic is making someone smile.
episodes.title: Who's Makin' Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Capt. John Yawn stops by to return Zeez's lost dream wand, and the new book from Shushy author Stephen King Mattress arrives in the Shushybye library.
episodes.title: I Really Love to Go to Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Snoozles, Zeez and Dozie pay PJ the DJ a visit in his studio to give him a special present for Friendship Appreciation Day.
episodes.title: Wake Up Zeez

episodes.synopsis: Conductor McCloud shows off his train's new dining car to the Shushies, and Wanda Wink helps them think of a way to show their appreciation.
episodes.title: The Shushybye Dream Team

episodes.synopsis: Snoozles and the rest of the Shushies are excited about hosting a fun-filled party with live music, dancing and Zeez's favorite: lots of food.
episodes.title: Boogie Tonight

episodes.synopsis: After wishing for a dream about a puppy, Marie learns that having a pet is a big responsibility. Miss Eve teaches the importance of saying thank you.
episodes.title: I Want to Thank You

episodes.synopsis: Snoozles spends a lovely day flying his favorite kite, and Anna makes a dream wish to visit America from her home in Italy.
episodes.title: From the Shushies with Love

episodes.synopsis: While the Shushies get ready for a fun-filled dance, Starbright takes Snore to the health center to see Dr. Breeze about his upset tummy.
episodes.title: Shushybye Hoe-Down

episodes.synopsis: Dozie asks Wanda Wink for help with Tiffany's dream of being a librarian, and Conductor McCloud reads the book he wrote at the Shushybye library.
episodes.title: My Newest Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Snore learns all about Snoozles to fulfill Charlie's dream wish, and Irene asks Starbright for a dream about starring in a movie.
episodes.title: Snoozles Won't You Come Out to Play

episodes.synopsis: The Shushies join PJ the DJ on his radio show to explain how to do the Shushy dance, and the Dreamsters perform aboard Capt. John Yawn's ship.
episodes.title: Do the Shushy Dance

episodes.synopsis: Capt. John Yawn helps make some last-minute dream deliveries so the Shushies can get to the Pillow Park concert on time.
episodes.title: Shushybye and Goodnight

episodes.synopsis: When Karolyn wants to dream about sailing on Capt. John Yawn's ship, Snoozles, Starbright and Dozie get to work making her dream.
episodes.title: A Land We Call Shushybye

episodes.synopsis: The Shushies throw Dozie a surprise birthday party, and Rachel sends Snore a wondrous thank you card for making her dreams.
episodes.title: The Shushybye Blues

episodes.synopsis: The Shushybye King invites the Dreamsters to perform at his castle, but when the singer gets a cold, another friend steps in so the show can go on.
episodes.title: It’s a Shushy Day
